name: night_train
description:
This game is really named "🌃 🚆", but I didn't want to risk entering that into the name field, so it's using the ASCII transcription - night_train. This was made for Mini Jam 68, which has a theme of "sleep" and a restriction of "no text."

I decided to follow a strict interpretation - the game includes no spoken narration either. Part of the idea is figuring out just what you're supposed to do, so... best of luck! There's a minimal tutorial included, but it's best if you just dive in.

If you are lost: Hfr gur neebj xrlf gb zbir, Hc gb whzc. Jnyx hc gb gur ebobgf naq cerff Ragre gb cvpx hc jungrire vgrz vf va gur fcrrpu ohooyr (vg fpebyyf nhgbzngvpnyyl). Cerff Gno gb plpyr guebhtu vgrzf lbh unir pbyyrpgrq. Tvir gur vgrzf gb gur cnffratref gb fpber cbvagf, ohg znlor qba'g vagreehcg gurve fyrrc gbb zhpu.


Assets used, in no particular order:
- The OpenMoji pack: https://openmoji.org/
- https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Chad_Crouch/Arps, specifically tracks "Ellipsis" and "Negentropy"
- https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/151240/
- https://freesound.org/people/mickmon/sounds/176866/
- https://freesound.org/people/MattLeschuck/sounds/511484/
- https://freesound.org/people/16HPanskaWillheimova_Sara/sounds/497564/
